triggered_conditions: Hidden Mint Function: The 'NICE' function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary number of tokens to any address without restrictions.
Limiting Sell Order: The owner can set the mint price to zero, allowing them to mint tokens for free and potentially dump them on the market.
Leaking Token: The 'withdraw' function allows the owner to withdraw all funds from the contract, potentially leaving other users with worthless tokens.
attack_path_summary: The function call sequence allows the owner to mint a large number of tokens to their own address for free, set the mint price to zero, and withdraw all funds from the contract, effectively executing a rug pull.
